name: Bionic Aftermath
description:
Bionic Aftermath is a short Beat 'Em Up made by Amnesia Interactive.

The story follows a cyborg super soldier named Shanks going up against C&B. C&B is a megacorporation run by a being known as The Mind. Shanks decided to take matters into his own hands and destroy the corporation before they take over the world.

This Prototype is part of a semester-long assignment for Students @OntarioTechUniversity. This game was not made for commercial purposes, so feel free to download and enjoy it for what it's worth.
